version_description:
We have been inspired by your comments and feedback and we are now thrilled to present our new version with lots of new features!

- Enjoy a beautiful & refreshed interface that sets you right in the mood to relax and sleep.
- Say hello to Di

We have been inspired by your comments and feedback and we are now thrilled to present our new version with lots of new features!

- Enjoy a beautiful & refreshed interface that sets you right in the mood to relax and sleep.
- Say hello to Di

-Added 8 new sounds
-Added fade out after timer
-Added "Clear all" button to clear selection
-Added automatic individual volume display

-Added 8 new sounds
-Added fade out after timer
-Added "Clear all" button to clear selection
-Added automatic individual volume display

-Added 2 binaural sounds added
-Added 9 new water sounds
-Added navigation arrows

-Added 2 binaural sounds added
-Added 9 new water sounds
-Added navigation arrows

Version 2.0 is a major update for Relax Melodies.

We have worked hard to bring you a lot of features requested by users and keep the best of Relax Melodies:

-New professional graphics and menu animations
-New Led Clock with brightness con

Version 2.0 is a major update for Relax Melodies.

We have worked hard to bring you a lot of features requested by users and keep the best of Relax Melodies:

-New professional graphics and menu animations
-New Led Clock with brightness con

- Improved alarm & timer system
- Added option to use favorites as alarm sound
- Added option to name favorites
- Added 12 am/pm hour clock option
- Added next timer or alarm time in the main page
- Twitter & Facebook integrati

- Improved alarm & timer system
- Added option to use favorites as alarm sound
- Added option to name favorites
- Added 12 am/pm hour clock option
- Added next timer or alarm time in the main page
- Twitter & Facebook integrati

Here is an update after the survey for new sounds. Thank you for voting! This update includes:

- 6 new sounds
- New icon
- Bug fixes

We hope you enjoy this update! We are already working on the next update that will add a playlist mod

Here is an update after the survey for new sounds. Thank you for voting! This update includes:

- 6 new sounds
- New icon
- Bug fixes

We hope you enjoy this update! We are already working on the next update that will add a playlist mod

What's new:

- 5 new sounds!
- Support for Retina graphics
- New background animation for a relaxing experience
- Sound now stops when unplugging headphones
- Remixed some older sounds for better looping
- 9 new alarm sounds
-

- Added 4 new sounds
- Introducing guided meditations for a richer relaxation experience

Relax Melodies for Apple Watch is here!
We are thrilled to announce your can now start your relaxing ambience right from your wrist!
The update also includes some stability and performance enhencements as well as some bug fixes.

Apple Watch F

Relax Melodies for Apple Watch is here!
We are thrilled to announce your can now start your relaxing ambience right from your wrist!
The update also includes some stability and performance enhencements as well as some bug fixes.

Apple Watch F

This update focuses on providing you with the best tools to help you sleep better

- New design
- Updated Discovery section
- New sounds
- New sleep meditation programs
- Bedtime Widget to remind you when it’s time to go to sleep
- iM

- Save your favorite mixes now directly from the sound library.

In this major update, Relax Melodies has been entirely rewritten for iOS 11, ensuring a smoother experience and a design compatible with iPhone X. We also bring you two more exciting features:

- A completely revamped meditation sectio

In this major update, you can now create your very own Relax Melodies account and take your relaxation and sleep experience to a whole new level! A few reasons why this is so exciting:

* We’ve added filters to help you make new sounds discoveries.<

For this latest release, we decided it was time to revolutionize your bedtime with a new way to fall asleep. Introducing our brand new section, Sleep Moves:

* Guided exercises done with a pillow to bring you into blissful sleep every night.

For this release, we're thrilled to present our new redesigned navigation. Discover and listen to content easily with our new sections, and access your mixer from anywhere in the app!

Your comments help us a lot. Do not hesitate to contact us at su

Hello sleepers! We’re excited to introduce our Composer feature. You will now be able to mix our rich library of sounds with songs from our brand new music section. We crafted 17 soothing songs to help you sleep deeper, focus and meditate.

We gave the SleepMoves section a brand new look with beautiful illustrations to showcase the gentle movements that make this practice so relaxing. Follow the guided instructions and unwind like never before with SleepMoves.

Your comments help us

Are you ready for lift off? We’re proud to present our new sleep-inducing sci-fi content! A soothing Bedtime Story titled ‘’Starship 28’’, a cosmic Sound Journey and many new futuristic sounds that will melt your present-day worries. See you in space

Travel: A routine to help you sleep when you’re far away from home.

We also improved the performance of the application and fixed some bugs.
